name: Ben Affleck
description: Ben Affleck is an American television and film actor, director, writer, and producer who started his acting career as a child artist with the PBS educational television series The Voyage of the Mimi in 1984. He is was seen in films like Shakespeare in Love, Pearl Harbor, and Gone Girl. However, he is best remembered for his portrayal of Batman in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice.

name: Henry Cavill
description: Henry Cavill is an English actor who is best known for portraying Superman in the DC Extended Universe films. He made his acting debut in the 2001 film Laguna, which was followed by supporting roles in acclaimed films like The Count of Monte Cristo (2002), I Capture the Castle (2003) and Stardust (2007). Cavill`s breakthrough role came in 2013, when he essayed the role of Superman (a.k.a., Clark Kent) in the superhero film Man of Steel. The actor has since reprised the role in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016) and Justice League (2017). Notable television credits include Goodbye Mr. Chips, Midsomer Murders and The Tudors. The epic fantasy action-adventure film Immortals (2011), the action spy comedy The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015) and the war drama Sand Castle (2017) are some of the actor`s other significant movie credits. His other project includes Mission: Impossible - Fallout (2018), Enola Holmes (2020) and Zack Snyder`s Justice League (2021). .

name: Gal Gadot
description: Best known to play the roles of `Gisele Yashar` in the Fast & Furious film series and the superhero character, `Wonder Woman,` Gal Gadot is an Israeli actress and model who works in Hollywood films. Before venturing into films, the actress was a popular model and participated in various beauty pageants. After winning the Miss Israeli pageant, she represented Israel at the Miss World beauty contest. Some of her most popular films include Fast & Furious (2009), Fast & Furious 6 (2013) and Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016), Wonder Woman (2017), Wonder Woman 1984 (2020) and Zack Snyder`s Justice League (2021).

name: Ray Fisher
birthPlace: Camden, New Jersey, United States Of America
description: Ray Fisher is an American stage and film actor. He rose to prominence courtesy of his roles in the play Fetch Clay, Make Man and subsequently made his feature film debut by essaying the role of Cyborg in the superhero movie Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016). Fisher has since reprised the role in the superhero film Justice League (2017) and Zack Snyder`s Justice League (2021). Other notable acting credits include several Shakespearean theatre productions and the TV series The Astronaut Wives Club (1999).

name: Jason Momoa
description: Jason Momoa is an American model, writer, producer, director and actor. He is best known for his performance as Khal Drogo in the HBO fantasy television series Game of Thrones (2011-2012). Road to Paloma (2014) was his first film as writer, actor, producer and director. In 2016, he was seen in Batman V Superman: Dawn of Justice. His 2017 releases include Once Upon a Time in Venice, The Bad Batch and Justice League. He was also seen in Aquaman (2018), directed by James Wan. His 2021 release includes Zack Snyder`s Justice League.

name: Zack Snyder
birthPlace: Green Bay, Wisconsin, United States Of America
description: Zack Snyder is an American filmmaker, writer, and producer who is best known for making action, superhero and sci-fi films. Snyder made his directorial debut with the horror film Dawn of the Dead, which was the remake of the 1978 film of the same name. Following his debut, Snyder has made several superheroes and comic book films including 300 (2007), Watchmen (2009), Man of Steel (2013), and Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016). His other release includes the American superhero film Wonder Woman and its sequel Wonder Woman 1984, which is his production venture. His 2021 releases include Zack Snyder`s Justice League, Army of the Dead and The Suicide Squad. His other projects include The Flash (2022) and Army of Thieves (2022).

name: Charles Roven
description: Charles Roven is an American film producer and the co-founder of the Atlas Entertainment, a production company. Roven who made his production debut with Heart Like a Wheel (1983) is best known for producing superhero films like The Dark Knight Trilogy, Suicide Squad (2016), Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol (2016) and Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016). His 2017 production ventures include Wonder Woman and Justice League. His other projects include Triple Frontier (2018), Scoob! (2020), Wonder Woman 1984 (2020) and Zack Snyder`s Justice League (2021).

name: Deborah Snyder
birthPlace: Pasadena, California, United States Of America
description: Deborah Snyder is an American producer who has been associated with movies like Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol (2011), _Man of Steel (2013), 300: Rise of an Empire (2014) and Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016). Her other projects include Wonder Woman (2017), Justice League (2017), Wonder Woman 1984 (2020), Zack Snyder`s Justice League (2021), Army of the Dead (2021), The Suicide Squad (2021) and The Flash (2022).

name: Chris Terrio
birthPlace: New York City, New York, United States Of America
description: Chris Terrio is an Academy Award winning American screenwriter and filmmaker. He made his debut as a writer-director with the 2005 film Heights, and rose to prominence when he won the Oscar for Best Adapted Screenplay for his work in the historical drama film Argo (2012). Other notable movie credits as a screenwriter include Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016) and Justice League (2017), the latter of which also features him as an executive producer. His 2019 he was the writer for yet another pop culture icon, Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker. His 2021 release includes Zack Snyder`s Justice League.

name: Will Beall
description: A former detective in the Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD), Will Beall announced his arrival in literary world with his acclaimed debut novel LA REX in 2006. Subsequently, he made his screenwriting debut with the Hollywood crime drama Gangster Squad (2013), which starred Sean Penn, Ryan Gosling, Josh Brolin and Emma Stone in the lead roles.

name: Adam Wingard
description: Adam Wingard is an American film director, producer, screenwriter, editor, cinematographer, actor, and composer. He is notable for his works in the horror and action genres, especially the films You`re Next (2011), The Guest (2014), Death Note (2017), and Godzilla vs. Kong (2021).

name: Jon Jashni
description: The founder of Raintree Ventures and the former president of Legendary Entertainment, Jon Jashni has been associated with the production of over forty films in the course of his career. He started out in Hollywood as a production associate with the 1987 romantic comedy Roxanne, and subsequently worked in over half a dozen movies before joining Legendary Entertainment in 2006. The Hangover (2009), the fantasy drama Where the Wild Things Are (2009), the epic historical fantasy 300: Rise of an Empire (2014) and the biographical drama Straight Outta Compton (2015) are some of Jashni`s notable film credits as an executive producer.

name: Eric McLeod
description: American film producer Eric McLeod has been associated with around thirty feature films in a career spanning over two decades. He is perhaps best known for bankrolling movies like Wag the Dog (1997), Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999), Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2005) and the black comedy Tropic Thunder (2009). Besides these, McLeod has also served as an executive producer on blockbusters like Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man`s Chest (2006), Pirates of the Caribbean: At World`s End (2007) and Kong: Skull Island (2017). Other notable film credits include Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (2010), The Lone Ranger (2013), Pacific Rim Uprising (2018) and Godzilla vs. Kong (2021).

name: Thomas Tull
description: The former CEO of Legendary Entertainment which gave us films like 300 (2006), The Dark Knight (2007) and The Hangover (2008), Thomas Tull is an American businessman, billionaire and film producer. He ventured into Hollywood in the mid 2000s, and has since been associated with the production of over fifty feature films. Superman Returns (2006), the action adventure fantasy Clash of the Titans (2010), the sci-fi film Inception (2010), The Dark Knight Rises (2012), Interstellar (2014) and Jurassic World (2015) are some of the blockbusters Tull has served as an executive producer in.

name: Terry Rossio
birthPlace: Kalamazoo, Michigan, United States Of America
description: Terry Rossio is an American screenwriter, born on July 2,1960inKalamazoo, Michigan, USA. He is best known for his work in the Pirates of the Caribbean film series. Rossio won BAFTA Film Award, Annie Award, New Media Film Festival Award & Western Writers of America Spur Award. He has been nominated for an Academy Award for Best Writing for Shrek (2001). His 2017 release includes the fifth installment in the Pirates of the Caribbean film series-Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar`s Revenge. His other projects include Aladdin (2019) and Godzilla vs. Kong (2021).

name: Louis Meunier
description: Louis Meunier is a writer and filmmaker who has worked on several documentaries and feature films, primarily focusing on stories in Afghanistan. His filmography includes Afghans to the Top (2011), Prisoners of the Himalayas (2013), Les Cavalier Afghans (2016) and Kabullywood (2017).

name: Antoine Marteau
description: Antoine Marteau is a cinematographer who has worked in both, French and British film industries. Among his extensive film and television work, some of his notable credits are A Common Man (2013), The ABCs of Death (2012), Full Speed (2016), 8th Wonderland (2008) and Kabullywood (2017).

name: Lewis Tan
description: British-born American actor and martial artist Lewis Tan is best known for essaying the character of Zhou Cheng in the TV series Marvels Iron Fist (2017-). The son of a former British fashion model and a Chinese stunt coordinator, Tan started out in showbiz through minor roles and on occasions, as a stunt double. The action film The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift (2006) and the epic fantasy swashbuckler film Pirates of the Caribbean: At World`s End (2007) were some of the actor`s earlier film credits as a stunt player.

name: Jessica McNamee
description: Jessica McNamee is an Australian actress best known for her role on the TV show Sirens (2014 - `15) wherein she essayed the lead character - Chicago Police Officer Theresa Kelly. However, McNamee`s claim to fame was her performance as Lisa Duffy in the soap opera Home and Away (2007). The actress also participated in the 2009 dancing reality show, Dancing with the Stars, finishing in the 6th place. In 2017, McNamee appeared in the movie directed by Jonathan Dayton and Valerie Faris. In 2018, she appeared alongside Jason Statham and Ruby Rose in Jon Turteltaub`s Hollywood action horror The Meg. Her other releases include Locusts (2019), Black Water: Abyss (2020) and Mortal Kombat (2021).

name: Josh Lawson
description: Joshua Lawson is an Australian actor best known for his role as Doug Guggenheim in the Showtime sitcom House of Lies. His film career began with BoyTown (2006). His other notable works include Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues (2013), Bombshell (2019), Holly Slept Over (2020) and Mortal Kombat (2021). His film The Little Death (2014) was nominated for the Australian Writers` Guild Award for Feature Film - Original and Sao Paulo International Film Festival Award for Best Feature Film. For The Eleven O`Clock (2016), he was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Live Action Short Film.

name: Simon McQuoid
description: Simon McQuoid is an American film director who is best known for his debut directorial venture Mortal Kombat (2021).

name: James Wan
description: Well-renowned for his work in the horror genre, James Wan is a Malaysian-born Australian film director, producer and screenwriter. Some of Wan`s notable directorial credits include Saw (2004), Insidious (2010), The Conjuring (2013), Furious 7 (2015), The Conjuring 2 (2016) and the superhero film Aquaman (2018). He is also credited for being the man who created Billy the Puppet from the Saw film franchise.

name: Todd Garner
description: Todd Garner, now, an independent producer and a writer, is recognized for movies like The One (2001), Radio (2003) and The Forgotten (2004). As an independent producer, Garner produced Here Comes the Boom and co-produced Mall Cop 2 with Paul Blart. Todd Garner`s production company along with the muscle of major studios rolled out The Zookeeper, starring Kevin James and Knight and Day, starring Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz.

name: E. Bennett Walsh
description: Hollywood producer Bennett Walsh has been in showbiz for over two decades now, and has bankrolled several movies. Some of his notable production credits include the crime drama Boiler Room (2000), the martial arts movie Kill Bill (2003-`04), the political thriller State of Play (2009) and the political thriller Edge of Darkness (2010).

name: Oren Uziel
description: Oren Uziel is a writer and producer who is best known for The Cloverfield Paradox (2018), 22 Jump Street (2014) and Mortal Kombat (2021).
